tool_description: Transforms celestial coordinates between different astronomical coordinate systems (ecliptic, equatorial, horizontal) for precise astrological calculations.

positions.description: Array of celestial positions in degrees to transform

source_system.description: Source coordinate system: ecliptic, equatorial, or horizontal

target_system.description: Target coordinate system: ecliptic, equatorial, or horizontal

observation_datetime.description: Date and time for coordinate transformation

error_messages: Invalid coordinate system: Use one of [ecliptic, equatorial, horizontal].
Missing location data: Latitude and longitude required for horizontal coordinate transformations.
Same source and target: Source and target coordinate systems cannot be identical.
Position out of range: All positions must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
Coordinate calculation error: Unable to perform transformation with given parameters.
usage: Provide array of positions, source_system, target_system, and observation_datetime. Include latitude/longitude for horizontal transformations. Returns transformed coordinates.

transformed_positions.description: Array of transformed position values in degrees

precision_estimate.description: Estimated precision of transformation in arc seconds
